person.persName: Junius Ward Johnson (Scott County, Kentucky, resident and cadet)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, resident and Lexington, Kentucky, cadet. Son of George W. Johnson and Ann Viley Johnson. Resident of Scott County in 1860. Cadet at the Virginia Military Academy in Lexington from 1864 to 1868.
